issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: All attempts at reproducing this issue failed, or not enough information was available to reproduce the issue. Reading the code produces no clues as to why this behavior would occur. If more information appears later, please reopen the issue.
resolution.name: Cannot Reproduce

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

components.name: Studio
components.description: Please enter tickets related to Titanium Studio here.

fields.description:
When we are trying to update Titanium, it is showing error due proxy authentication. We have already set the proxy in Preference-> Network.

Can you help where is the issue?

comments.body:
We have fixed a number of proxy issues with 3.2.1 release that is due to be out later this month. Can you please download and install the latest 3.2.1 beta version to confirm that your issue has been resolved? You can download the latest version from the following link:

http://preview.appcelerator.com/studio/

We cannot reproduce this issue with 3.2.1 release and there is really no specific information in this ticket to diagnose this issue further. We would be happy to reopen this ticket if you can provide us steps to reproduce this issue.
